enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: Following informal consultations, Co-Chair Mamadou Honadia introduced a draft decision stating that Parties 'approve and adopt' the compliance mechanism as contained in Decision 24/CP.7.
The text adds that consideration of an amendment to the Protocol will commence at SBI 24 with a view to making a decision at COP/MOP 3.
Parties raised no objections and decided to forward it to COP/MOP 1 for adoption.
